title: Poolmaster
detail: Giving the players helpful information using image processing
extended_details: By collecting data at each point in a pool game through a camera placed above the table, our project will display to the players important information such as which balls are most difficult to hit and at which angle to hit them with what spin. Also, we will give users live feedback on their positioning using sensors on the stick.
